Description: Mummy of a crocodile, no wrappings survive, head damaged.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2001 26 Jun-23 Sep, Birmingham Gas Hall, Egypt Revealed 2006-2007 6 Oct-18 Feb, Tokyo, National Museum of Nature and Science, Mummy: The Inside Story 2007 17 Mar-17 Jun, Kobe City Museum, Mummy: The Inside Story 2011 27th June - 31st August, Bowes Museum : Ancient Egypt
